model-checker.title: ModelChecker
model-checker.minimize-tooltip: When enabled, only necessary checks are evaluated. Required for big graphs and complex formulas.

controls.view:
View
        Moving nodes - Middle mouse button
        Move view - Left mouse button
controls.graph:
Graph
        Selecting - Right mouse button / Long touch
        Creating nodes - Double-click / Plus-button
        Creating edges - Click / Touch and drag

export.copy-failure: Could not copy Graph to clipboard.
export.copy-success: Graph has been copied to the clipboard.

node.missing: Invalid graph: Node "{{node}}" is missing from the graph.
node.invalid-relations: Invalid graph: Node "{{node}}" has invalid relation(s) (Relations must begin with an uppercase letter).
node.invalid-constants: Invalid graph: Node "{{node}}" has invalid constant(s) (Constants must begin with a lowercase letter).

edge.missing: Invalid graph: Edge from "{{source}}" to "{{target}}" is missing from the graph.
edge.invalid-relations: Invalid graph: Edge from "{{source}}" to "{{target}}" has invalid relation(s) (Relations must begin with an uppercase letter).
edge.invalid-functions: Invalid graph: Edge from "{{source}}" to "{{target}}" has invalid function(s) (Functions must begin with a lowercase letter).

validation.parse-error: Input does not match the graph schema.
validation.constant-pattern-error: Names of constants must start with a lowercase letter and cannot contain special characters.
validation.function-pattern-error: Names of functions must start with a lowercase letter and cannot contain special characters.
validation.relation-pattern-error: Names of relations must start with an uppercase letter and cannot contain special characters.

api.valid: The graph is a model of the formula
api.invalid: The graph is not a model of the formula

forall.valid: Subformula holds for all variable assignments
forall.invalid: Subformula does not hold for some variable assignments

exists.valid: Subformula holds for some variable assignments
exists.invalid: Subformula holds for no variable assignments

implication.invalid: Antecedent holds but consequent does not

bi-implication.valid: Antecedent holds if and only if consequent holds
bi-implication.invalid: Antecedent does not hold if and only if consequent holds

positive.valid: Antecedent holds if and only if consequent holds
positive.invalid: Antecedent does not hold if and only if consequent holds

negative.valid: Antecedent does not hold if and only if consequent does not hold
negative.invalid: Antecedent holds if and only if consequent does not hold

error.duplicate-constant: The constant "{{constant}}" can only be assigned to one node.
error.different-arities: The symbol "{{symbol}}" is defined with different arities within the graph.
error.different-function-values: The unary function "{{function}}" has two function values for at least one node. A function must be right-unique.
error.different-arities-formula: The arity of the symbol "{{symbol}}" differs between graph and formula.
error.bound-variable-reuse: In the formula, the symbol "{{symbol}}" is defined as a bound variable, but used as a function symbol in the graph.
error.undefined-constant: The constant "{{constant}}" appears in the formula, but not defined in the graph.
error.function-totality: The unary function "{{function}}" must be total.
error.empty-graph: The graph must contain at least one node.
error.missing-node: The node "{{node}}" is missing from the graph.
error.invalid-relation: The relation "{{relation}}" is invalid. Relation symbols cannot be empty and must start with an uppercase letter.
error.invalid-function: The function "{{function}}" is invalid. Function symbols cannot be empty and must start with a lowercase letter.
error.invalid-constant: The constant "{{constant}}" is invalid. Constant symbols cannot be empty and must start with a lowercase letter.
error.request-too-big: The computation is too big for the server. Try a lower feedback setting.
error.response-too-big: The result is too big for the server. Try a lower feedback setting.

full.name: Full
full.description: Full evaluation, including redundant checks. May not work for large graphs and complex formulas.

relevant.name: Relevant
relevant.description: Partial evaluation, excluding redundant checks. Recommended.

minimal.name: Minimal
minimal.description: Partial evaluation, excluding redundant checks. Only the result.

result-tree.expand-error: Unable to expand tree completely, because the dataset is too big.
